data.message: I am not sure this is the right place to discuss this, but do you guys think that the penetration of Python, Ruby , Linux, even C++ and Java among Egyptian developers is close to the penetration of those standard (mostly open source) languages in US/Europe or even advancing IT countries like India/China/Israel ..... , I have an impression we (as Egyptians) are more into MS .net much more than normal and this could be a big block for our future in this field , a friend of me was told this piece of information by a Google interviewer back in 2008, I think it could be even worse now
apologies if the group (or post) are not the right place to ask / discuss this
Remind me of the old C vs. VB days, relax man.
